titles.title: 058 Praise To The Lord The Almighty

properties.copyright: Public Domain, Administered by CCLI Administration Account

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
Praise to the Lord, the Almighty
The King of creation
O my soul praise Him
For He is thy health and salvation

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
All ye who hear
Now to His temple draw near
Join me in glad adoration

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Praise to the Lord
Who o'er all things
So wondrously reigneth
Shelters thee under His wings
Yea, so gently sustaineth

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Hast Thou not seen
How thy desires all have been
Granted in what He ordaineth

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
praise to the Lord who hath fearfully
wondrously made thee
health hath vouchsafed and when
heedlessly falling hath stayed thee

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
what need or grief
ever hath failed of relief
wings of His mercy did shade thee

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Praise to the Lord
Who doth prosper
Thy work and defend thee
Surely His goodness and mercy
Here daily attend thee

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Ponder anew
what the Almighty can do
Who with His love doth befriend thee

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Praise to the Lord
O let all that is in me adore Him
All that hath life and breath
Come now with praises before Him

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Let the amen
sound from His people again
Gladly for aye we adore Him
